div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 212 Qesarat, c. 15 km. NW of Tepelenë, Albania, 1963 Burial: c. 200 B.C. (Ceka) Contents: 4 AR, 45 AE. Pot hoard Apollonia: 1 dr.; 2 AE Byllis: 18 AE Dyrrhachium: 1 dr. Epirote Rep.: 2 dr.; 21 AE Unc.: 4 AE Disposition: Tiranë Information from H. Ceka
